711321f-a.text:
E. 15th Street, north side, east from Second to First Aves., showing progressively; Stuyvesant Square Park, the N.Y. Infirmary for Women and Children and Stuyvesant High School. Across the park appears Nos. 1, 2-3 and 4-5 Livingston Place, all additions to the afore mentioned [sic] hospital at the corner proper.
December 21, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

707524f-a.text:
1 Ave. n. of 15 St. from "L" Express Platform
6-13-42

P.L. Sperr
